about_the_game:
Get ready for a fresh new experience with Sunstone War, an Action game with tower defense element where you can carry EVERYTHING!

Discover Unprecedented Freedom

Enjoy a refreshing twist to traditional Tower Defense gameplay by granting you the freedom to carry EVERYTHING! – from towers to obstacles and even enemies!
Craft impenetrable defenses by strategically relocating towers to create a barrier, or scatter approaching enemies by picking them up and hurling them into the distance.
With the ability to shape the battlefield to your advantage, every level becomes an opportunity to unleash your creativity and strategic prowess.
With multiple ways to complete levels, you'll need to discover your own unique playstyle to conquer the challenges ahead!

Face Multiple Challenges

As you face off against a myriad of foes, each presents a unique challenge that will test your skills and wit. From lightning-fast adversaries to those who summon reinforcements, and even elusive invisible foes, you'll encounter a diverse array of obstacles that demand real-time strategizing.
With countless approaches to level completion, mastering your own style of gameplay is key to victory.

Upgrades and Progression

To aid you in your quest, use an upgrade system to continually enhance your abilities, including speed, endurance, and tower power!
Uncover two game-changing powers capable of shifting the tide of battle in your favor.
As you venture through 3 distinct biomes, each presenting its own set of challenges, items and opportunities, experiment with diverse strategies to find your own playstyle!


Whether you prefer tactical finesse or brute force, Sunstone War empowers every player to forge their unique path to victory!


Included in Sunstone War:
  • 5-8 hours of play time.
  • A "busy" tower defense where you will need to be active to win.
  • 60+ challenging levels, each testing your tactical prowess.

NOT included in Sunstone War:
  • Static and Classic Tower Defense mechanics
  • Infinite replayability

    Get ready to embark on an epic journey filled with strategic depth, thrilling action, and the relentless pursuit of victory in Sunstone War!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6 GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Run on both Apple M1 and Intel Core M
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card with at least 1024MB of video memory

name: Sunstone War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
